function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with regulations for social distancing and closure of non-essential services","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Enforcement of regulations, public awareness campaigns, and support for businesses to comply","Technologies":"Digital monitoring and tracking systems, communication tools for public awareness","People":"General population, businesses, employees","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, businesses"},{"Description":"Layoffs and remote work due to closure of non-essential services","Impact":"Economic hardship, potential increase in movement of people seeking alternative work","Mitigation":"Financial support, remote work infrastructure, job retraining programs","Technologies":"Remote work tools, online training platforms, financial assistance systems","People":"Employees, businesses, government","Owner":"Government, business owners"},{"Description":"Messaging on caloric count and food choices in restaurants","Impact":"Impact on consumer food choices and health behaviors","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, support for businesses to comply, nutrition labeling regulations","Technologies":"Menu labeling systems, consumer awareness platforms","People":"Consumers, restaurant owners, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
